RuleSet.Name: schema/dbcreate/pgsql/crdb_schema.bash
RuleSet.GenRule: # # Initialize locals # pgdatadir="" pgdb="" pghost="" pgport="" pgpwd="" pgsrv="" pguser="" logfilename="" parmerrors="" TK_DUALCASE_IN_CASE_STATEMENTS=true

# # Validate parameters #
if [ "$${pguser}" = "" ]; then echo >&2 "WARNING: Postgres DBA login not specified with '-U username', using default 'postgres'" fi
if [ "$${pgpwd}" = "" ]; then echo >&2 "ERROR: Password must be specified with '-P password'" parmerrors="Y" fi
if [ "$${pghost}" = "" ]; then echo >&2 "ERROR: Server hostname must be specified with '-H hostname'" parmerrors="Y" fi
if [ "$${pgdatadir}" = "" ]; then echo >&2 "WARNING: Database data directory was not specified with '-D directory', tablespaces will not be created" fi
if [ "$$parmerrors" != "" ]; then echo >&2 "ABORT: Cannot continue" exit 1 fi
if [ "$${logfilename}" = "" ]; then logfilename=`date +'crdb_$lower DbSchemaName$-%Y%m%d_%Hh%M.log'` echo "" >$${logfilename} fi
export PGPASSWORD="$${pgpwd}"
if [ "$${pgport}" != "" ]; then export PGPORT="--port=$${pgport} " export PASSPGPORT="-p $${pgport} " else export PGPORT="" export PASSPGPORT="" fi

# # Create the tablespaces #
if [ "$${pgdatadir}" != "" ]; then
need_dirs="N"
if [ ! -d $${pgdatadir} ]; then need_dirs="Y" fi
if [ ! -d $${pgdatadir}/$lower DbSchemaName$_data1 ]; then need_dirs="Y" fi
if [ ! -d $${pgdatadir}/$lower DbSchemaName$_idx1 ]; then need_dirs="Y" fi
if [ "$${need_dirs}" = "Y" ]; then echo "Creating tablespace directories" | tee -a $${logfilename}
if [ "$${OS}" != "Windows_NT" ]; then su $${pguser} --command="mkdir $${pgdatadir} $${pgdatadir}/$lower DbSchemaName$_data1 $${pgdatadir}/$lower DbSchemaName$_idx1" else runas /user:$${COMPUTERNAME}\\\\$${pguser} "mkdir $${pgdatadir} $${pgdatadir}/$lower DbSchemaName$_data1 $${pgdatadir}/$lower DbSchemaName$_idx1" fi fi
echo "" | tee -a $${logfilename} echo "Creating tablespaces $lower DbSchemaName$_data1 and $lower DbSchemaName$_idx1" | tee -a $${logfilename} psql -h $${pghost} $${PGPORT} -d template1 -U $${pguser} -a -e -c "create tablespace $lower DbSchemaName$_data1 location '$${pgdatadir}/$lower DbSchemaName$_data1'" >>$${logfilename} 2>&1
psql -h $${pghost} $${PGPORT} -d template1 -U $${pguser} -a -e -c "create tablespace $lower DbSchemaName$_idx1 location '$${pgdatadir}/$lower DbSchemaName$_idx1'" >>$${logfilename} 2>&1
fi
